neighbors.name: Tommy A. Jerin and Amanda R. Jerin
neighbors.claims: Tommy A. Jerin and Amanda R. Jerin are listed as property owners in Berkeley County, but no verified public records regarding their employment or civic involvement in West Virginia could be confirmed [Berkeley County Assessor](https://www.theassessor.org/). A 'Thomas Jerin' listed in online databases associated with DaVita Kidney Care appears to reside in Arizona, suggesting the draft's previous employment attribution was a mismatch [Consumer Reports Petition](https://advocacy.consumerreports.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Appendix-A-CR-Petition-to-FTC-re-Junk-Fees-merged.pdf).

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach with general courtesy as private residents. Since specific professional background could not be verified locally, avoid assumptions about technical or military experience unless confirmed in conversation.

citations.claim: Tommy A. Jerin and Amanda R. Jerin are listed as property owners in Berkeley County
citations.title: Berkeley County Assessor Records

citations.claim: A 'Thomas Jerin' listed in online databases associated with DaVita Kidney Care appears to reside in Arizona
citations.title: Consumer Reports Petition Signatures (Page 221)

neighbors.name: Ann Marie Priddle
neighbors.claims: Ann M. Priddle is employed as a school bus operator for Berkeley County Schools [Berkeley County Schools Staff Directory](https://www.berkeleycountyschools.org/staff?filter_ids=315631&page_no=13). Aside from her occupation, there is no record of Priddle’s involvement in local boards or public commentary on development issues in Berkeley County [Berkeley County Assessor](https://www.theassessor.org/).

approach_recommendations.engage: Highlight traffic safety and roadway plans when communicating with Priddle. Given her role in student transportation, reassure her that construction traffic will be managed to ensure school bus routes remain safe and unobstructed.

citations.claim: Ann M. Priddle is employed as a school bus operator for Berkeley County Schools
citations.title: Berkeley County Schools Staff Directory

citations.claim: no record of Priddle’s involvement in local boards or public commentary
citations.title: Berkeley County Assessor

neighbors.name: Christopher Graham
neighbors.claims: Christopher Graham is a resident of the Falling Waters area and an active participant in Sports Car Club of America (SCCA) racing events, frequently competing in the Mid-Atlantic Road Racing Series [SCCA Region Status](https://www.scdareg.com/events/CB59B842-9C3C-9066-6B0C5C5B601F36BA/status). He is listed in race results as driving a BMW 328is [MotorsportReg](https://www.motorsportreg.com/events/DE7F39F9-BEFC-29A4-9DDBFBA298D18AB4/status). Note: A 'Christopher Graham' serving as a Fire Captain and Volunteer WV Commissioner is located in Beckley, WV (Raleigh County), not Berkeley County [Volunteer WV Annual Report](https://volunteer.wv.gov/whoweare/SiteAssets/Pages/Annual-Report/2024%20Volunteer%20WV%20Annual%20Report_Web.pdf).

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach Graham with general courtesy. Given his interest in automotive performance, he may appreciate technical details regarding the project's logistics or road use, but otherwise appears to be a private resident.

citations.claim: active participant in Sports Car Club of America (SCCA) racing events, frequently competing in the Mid-Atlantic Road Racing Series
citations.title: SCCA Region Status - 2024 Road Racing Vehicle Number Reservation

citations.claim: listed in race results as driving a BMW 328is
citations.title: Wash DC Region SCCA July MARRS 2024 Attendees

citations.claim: A 'Christopher Graham' serving as a Fire Captain and Volunteer WV Commissioner is located in Beckley, WV
citations.title: Volunteer West Virginia 2024 Annual Report

neighbors.name: Joe Ernest Hronesz and Jessica Frances Hronesz
neighbors.claims: Joe E. Hronesz is a prominent local banker, currently serving as Senior Vice President and Chief Credit Officer of CNB Bank [CNB Bank Press Release](https://www.cnb.bank/Who-We-Are/News-and-Announcements/entryid/208/cnb-bank-announces-joe-hronesz-as-next-cfo). In October 2024, it was announced that he will become the bank’s Chief Financial Officer effective Spring 2025 [CNB Bank Press Release](https://www.cnb.bank/Who-We-Are/News-and-Announcements/entryid/208/cnb-bank-announces-joe-hronesz-as-next-cfo). The announcement noted his 24+ years of experience in community banking and his residence with wife Jess (Jessica) [CNB Bank Press Release](https://www.cnb.bank/Who-We-Are/News-and-Announcements/entryid/208/cnb-bank-announces-joe-hronesz-as-next-cfo).

approach_recommendations.engage: Have the project’s economic or financial representative reach out to Hronesz. A data-rich discussion emphasizing local tax benefits, economic growth, and financial assurances will align with his business perspective and address any fiscal or investment concerns.

citations.claim: currently serving as Senior Vice President and Chief Credit Officer of CNB Bank
citations.title: CNB Bank Announces Joe Hronesz as Next CFO

citations.claim: will become the bank’s Chief Financial Officer effective Spring 2025
citations.title: CNB Bank Announces Joe Hronesz as Next CFO
CNB Bank Announces Joe Hronesz as Next CFO

neighbors.name: Jonathan D. Smith and Tonya R. Smith
neighbors.claims: Jonathan D. Smith is a licensed chiropractor operating 'Jonathan D. Smith, DC, PC' in Falling Waters, WV [Wellness.com Provider Listing](https://green.wellness.com/find/chiropractor/wv/rippon/3). No public statements on development were found for the Smiths, who appear to be private residents [Berkeley County Assessor](https://www.theassessor.org/).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the Smiths through one-on-one conversation to build trust. As a local healthcare provider, Mr. Smith may have a network of local patients; a professional, transparent approach is recommended.
